subScenes.name: 问候与开场
subScenes.description: 礼貌开场，询问会议室预订事宜

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, could you help me book a meeting room?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨，你能帮我预订个会议室吗？

responses.text: Of course! What time and room size do you need?
responses.text_cn: 当然可以！您需要什么时间、多大的房间？

responses.text: Sure thing! Let me check availability.
responses.text_cn: 没问题，我查一下空闲时段。

responses.text: Yeah, what's up?

qaPairs.usageNote: 用礼貌请求开启对话，避免直接命令

subScenes.name: 询问可用时间
subScenes.description: 确认会议室在特定时段是否可用

qaPairs.speakerText: Is the big conference room free on Thursday at 2 PM?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 周四下午两点大会议室有空吗？

responses.text: Let me check... Yep, it's available!
Actually, it's booked until 4 PM. How about 4:30?
responses.text_cn: 其实它被订到四点了，四点半行吗？

responses.text: Nope, sorry.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提出替代时间，提高预订成功率

qaPairs.speakerText: Do you have any smaller rooms open at 10 AM?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 上午十点有小会议室空着吗？

responses.text: The huddle room’s free — perfect for 4 people.
responses.text_cn: 小讨论室有空，适合四人会议。

responses.text: We only have the boardroom — it’s big, but free.
responses.text_cn: 只有董事会议室，大了点但空着。

responses.text: Not at 10, but 10:30 works.

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据人数灵活推荐合适房间类型

subScenes.name: 确认设备需求
subScenes.description: 明确会议所需设备如投影、视频等

qaPairs.speakerText: Can you set up the projector and mic for us?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能帮我们安排投影仪和话筒吗？

responses.text: Already on it — projector, mic, and Wi-Fi covered.
responses.text_cn: 已安排好：投影、话筒和Wi-Fi都包了。

responses.text: We’ve got the projector, but no mic — can you bring your own?
responses.text_cn: 有投影仪，但没话筒，你能自带吗？

responses.text: Sure, no problem.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动确认设备，避免会议现场出状况

qaPairs.speakerText: Do you have Zoom setup ready?

responses.text: Yep, the room’s got Zoom-ready monitors and cameras.
responses.text_cn: 有，房间配有支持Zoom的屏幕和摄像头。

responses.text: We only have Teams — is that okay?
I’ll get a laptop ready.

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认平台兼容性，避免技术尴尬

subScenes.name: 最终确认与预订
subScenes.description: 确认时间、房间、设备并完成预订

qaPairs.speakerText: So, Thursday at 2 in the big room, projector and Zoom — got it?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 所以周四下午两点，大会议室，投影和Zoom，对吧？

responses.text: Yes, booked! I’ll send you a calendar invite now.
responses.text_cn: 对，订好了！我马上发日历邀请。

responses.text: Perfect, thanks! I’ll see you there.
Yup, all set.

qaPairs.usageNote: 复述关键信息确保无误，再确认预订

subScenes.name: 道别与后续
subScenes.description: 礼貌结束对话，说明后续安排

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much for helping out!

responses.text: Anytime! Just let me know if anything changes.
responses.text_cn: 随时找我！有变动记得告诉我。

responses.text: No worries — have a great meeting!
Cool, peace out.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用积极语句收尾，留下良好印象
